gidget.title: Gidget
gidget.quick: Gidget is an educational programming and debugging game developed at the University of Washington iSchool.

wte.title: What To Eat (WTE)
wte.quick: Received 'Runner up' at 24hr Facebook Hackathon. I collaborated with a friend to develop an application which filtered a restaurants menu based on nutritional needs.

databaseMigration.title: Database Migration
databaseMigration.quick: Worked with a team of peers on a competitive project to migrate data from one database system to another and to keep the data synced.

pcParts.title: PC Parts Database
pcParts.quick: Course assignment that required teams of students to choose a topic and then build a database. Our group chose to build a database for a business centered around PC parts.
